title: Jack and Lily's Favorite Food
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 48 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 170L
description: What foods do Jack and Lily like? Are the two alike or different? This book allows students to compare and contrast the two characters. Students will love the detailed, supportive illustrations. Repetitive phrases and high-frequency words support early readers.
reviewWords: chicken, different, pork, salmon, same, tuna
comprehension: Compare and Contrast                : Compare and contrast
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /l/ sound
grammar: Capitalization                : Recognize and use capital letters
wordWork: Alphabetizing                : Alphabetize words by their initial letter
